name: koillection
description: Koillection is a self hosted collection manager for physical or digital items such as books, games or gadgets. It lets users catalog items with images, metadata and tags and browse their collections in a customizable web interface.

features.title: Collection Management
features.description: Catalog physical items like books, games, and collectibles. Organize your possessions digitally

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload multiple photos for each item with gallery views. Document your collection visually

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Organize items with tags, categories, and hierarchical collections. Structure collections logically

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Advanced search and filtering to find items quickly. Navigate large collections efficiently
